Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
High visibility location with easy access to all parts of the Rio Grande Valley
via Expressway 83. Adjacent to the high-end Newport Landing subdivision
and minutes from Historic downtown McAllen and the McAllen Country Club/
Country Club Terrace via Jackson Ave and McColl Rd. Additionally, Rio Bank
Building is 5 minutes from the McAllen airport. The property is also in close
proximity to McAllen Heart Hospital and Rio Grande Regional Hospital, both
a part of the McAllen Medical Center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 701 E. Expressway 83 is the first true Class A+ office building currently being built in McAllen, Texas, complete with on-site banking and amenity event space. First class finishes throughout, with incredible visibility, views and covered parking.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New 115,875 SF Class A+ Office Building

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: Rio Bank Building - Third Floorplan Updated

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Amenities: Onsite Café / Catering & Coffee Zone

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: High visibility location with easy access to all parts of the Rio Grande Valley via Expressway 83. Adjacent to the high-end Newport Landing subdivision and minutes from Historic downtown McAllen and the McAllen Country Club/Country Club Terrace via Jackson Ave and McColl Rd. Additionally, Rio Bank Building is 5 minutes from the McAllen airport. The property is also in close proximity to McAllen Heart Hospital and Rio Grande Regional Hospital, both a part of the McAllen Medical Center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 701 E. Expressway 83 is the first true Class A+ office building currently being built in McAllen, Texas, with first class finishes throughout, with incredible visibility, views and covered parking.

address.Common.Line1: Executive Office at Sharyland Business Park

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Executive Office at Sharyland Business Park

Common.ActualAddress.Common.Line1: Executive Office at Sharyland Business Park

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Executive Office at Sharyland Business Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The executive office at 4900 George McVay was the former home of the Panasonic Product Renewal Center in McAllen, TX. This class A facility is anchored at the entrance of the master-planned Sharyland Business Park. Equipped with one of the most modern infrastructures along the U.S.-Mexico border, Sharyland Business Park is home to notable tenants, such as, DHL, Alps Logistics, Regal, Ceva Logistics, and Commscope.
